author: NBC 10 NEWS
title: chevron-right
text: {p}{strong}From: Christina Erne, Storm Team 10{ }{/strong}{strong}Meteorologist:{/strong}{/p}{p}A Heat Advisory remains in place for portions of southern New England for inland temperatures nearing 90 degrees again, along with high humidity. As a result, inland communities might see heat indices into the middle and upper 90s, with the coastline heading into the upper 80s. Hazy, hot and humid conditions will trigger a few storms mainly north into Massachusetts, but a few inland thunderstorms are possible later in the day.{/p}{p}Both weekend days feature high humidity in place, making the 80s feel more like the 90s. Both also feature partly sunny skies with a storm risk, but Saturday during the daytime hours is generally looking drier and brighter with isolated storms moving in by evening. Sunday features a mix of sun and clouds with scattered showers or storms possible in the afternoon and evening. Stay weather aware during your outdoor plans this weekend!{/p}{p}{strong}Storm Team 10 Weather Blog:{/strong} {a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/weather-blog\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/weather-blog\"}Read the latest weather news and headlines for Southern New England{/a}{/p}{p}Friday: Hot, hazy, humid. Isolated evening storms are possible inland. High: 90 (Heat Indices: 92-97 inland){br}{/p}{p}Saturday: Partly sunny, scattered storms possible especially during the evening. High: 86{/p}{p}Sunday: Partly sunny, scattered thunderstorm risk. High: 84{br}{/p}{p}Monday: Partly sunny, chance of a few storms. High: 87{/p}{p}Tuesday: Partly cloudy. High: 80{/p}{p}Wednesday: Partly cloudy skies. High: 79{/p}{p}Thursday: Partly sunny skies, watching a tropical development. High: 76{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather\"}{strong}MORE FROM STORM TEAM 10{/strong}{/a}{br}{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/chimein\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/chimein\"}Submit your weather pictures and videos using Chime In{/a}{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/radar\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/radar\"}Track rain and snow using our Interactive Radar{/a}{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/maps\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/maps\"}View the latest weather maps here{/a}{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/webcams\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/webcams\"}Check local conditions using our Skycam Network{/a}{strong}{br}{/strong}{/p}{p}The Warwick Police Department has arrested a man connected to a fatal hit-and-run.{/p}{p}Police arrested 24-year-old Dannys L. De Jesus Marcano at his North Kingstown home on Thursday.{/p}{p}De Jesus Marcano is charged in a deadly crash on Quaker Lane on Sunday.{/p}{p}That crash hit Nicholas Cote and Logan Barboza.{/p}{ul}{li}{strong}RELATED:{ }{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/news/local/police-respond-to-incident-on-quaker-lane-in-warwick#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/news/local/police-respond-to-incident-on-quaker-lane-in-warwick#\"}Man, 44, dies after hit-and-run pedestrian crash in Warwick{ }{/a}{/strong}{/li}{/ul}{p}Police say Barboza had hit Cote. When Barboza got out to check on Cote, they both were struck by a dark-colored SUV.{/p}{p}The department alleges De Jesus Marcano was driving that vehicle, and has been charged with one count of Duty to stop in an accident resulting in death, and one count of duty to stop in an accident resulting in serious bodily injury.{/p}{p}He is expected to be arraigned on Friday at the Nel Judicial Complex.{/p}{p}{br}{/p}{p}{ }{ }{/p}{p}{strong}From: Christina Erne, Storm Team 10{ }{/strong}{strong}Meteorologist:{/strong}{/p}{p}A Heat Advisory remains in place for portions of southern New England for inland temperatures nearing 90 degrees again, along with high humidity. As a result, inland communities might see heat indices into the middle and upper 90s, with the coastline heading into the upper 80s. Hazy, hot and humid conditions will trigger a few storms mainly north into Massachusetts, but a few inland thunderstorms are possible later in the day.{/p}{p}Both weekend days feature high humidity in place, making the 80s feel more like the 90s. Both also feature partly sunny skies with a storm risk, but Saturday during the daytime hours is generally looking drier and brighter with isolated storms moving in by evening. Sunday features a mix of sun and clouds with scattered showers or storms possible in the afternoon and evening. Stay weather aware during your outdoor plans this weekend!{/p}{p}{strong}Storm Team 10 Weather Blog:{/strong} {a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/weather-blog\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/weather-blog\"}Read the latest weather news and headlines for Southern New England{/a}{/p}{p}Friday: Hot, hazy, humid. Isolated evening storms are possible inland. High: 90 (Heat Indices: 92-97 inland){br}{/p}{p}Saturday: Partly sunny, scattered storms possible especially during the evening. High: 86{/p}{p}Sunday: Partly sunny, scattered thunderstorm risk. High: 84{br}{/p}{p}Monday: Partly sunny, chance of a few storms. High: 87{/p}{p}Tuesday: Partly cloudy. High: 80{/p}{p}Wednesday: Partly cloudy skies. High: 79{/p}{p}Thursday: Partly sunny skies, watching a tropical development. High: 76{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather\"}{strong}MORE FROM STORM TEAM 10{/strong}{/a}{br}{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/chimein\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/chimein\"}Submit your weather pictures and videos using Chime In{/a}{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/radar\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/radar\"}Track rain and snow using our Interactive Radar{/a}{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/maps\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/maps\"}View the latest weather maps here{/a}{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/webcams\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/webcams\"}Check local conditions using our Skycam Network{/a}{strong}{br}{/strong}{/p}{p}The Warwick Police Department has arrested a man connected to a fatal hit-and-run.{/p}{p}Police arrested 24-year-old Dannys L. De Jesus Marcano at his North Kingstown home on Thursday.{/p}{p}De Jesus Marcano is charged in a deadly crash on Quaker Lane on Sunday.{/p}{p}That crash hit Nicholas Cote and Logan Barboza.{/p}{ul}{li}{strong}RELATED:{ }{a href=\"https://turnto10.com/news/local/police-respond-to-incident-on-quaker-lane-in-warwick#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/news/local/police-respond-to-incident-on-quaker-lane-in-warwick#\"}Man, 44, dies after hit-and-run pedestrian crash in Warwick{ }{/a}{/strong}{/li}{/ul}{p}Police say Barboza had hit Cote. When Barboza got out to check on Cote, they both were struck by a dark-colored SUV.{/p}{p}The department alleges De Jesus Marcano was driving that vehicle, and has been charged with one count of Duty to stop in an accident resulting in death, and one count of duty to stop in an accident resulting in serious bodily injury.{/p}{p}He is expected to be arraigned on Friday at the Nel Judicial Complex.{/p}{p}{br}{/p}{p}{ }{ }{/p}
